name: pound
description:
The target is physically pounded with a long tail, a
foreleg, or the like.

name: karate-chop
description:
The target is attacked with a sharp chop. Critical
hits land more easily.

name: double-slap
description:
The target is slapped repeatedly, back and forth,
two to five times in a row.

name: comet-punch
description:
The target is hit with a flurry of punches that strike
two to five times in a row.

name: mega-punch
description:
The target is slugged by a punch thrown with
muscle-packed power.

name: pay-day
description:
Numerous coins are hurled at the target to inflict
damage. Money is earned after the battle.

name: fire-punch
description:
The target is punched with a fiery fist. This may also
leave the target with a burn.

name: ice-punch
description:
The target is punched with an icy fist. This may also
leave the target frozen.

name: thunder-punch
description:
The target is punched with an electrified fist.
This may also leave the target with paralysis.

name: scratch
description:
Hard, pointed, and sharp claws rake
the target to inflict damage.

name: vice-grip
description:
The target is gripped and squeezed from both sides
to inflict damage.

name: guillotine
description:
A vicious, tearing attack with big pincers.
The target will faint instantly
if this attack hits.

name: razor-wind
description:
In this two-turn attack, blades of wind hit opposing
Pokémon on the second turn. Critical hits land
more easily.

name: swords-dance
description:
A frenetic dance to uplift the fighting spirit.
This sharply raises the user’s Attack stat.

name: cut
description:
The target is cut with a scythe or claw.
This can also be used to cut down thin trees.

name: gust
description:
A gust of wind is whipped up by wings and launched
at the target to inflict damage.

name: wing-attack
description:
The target is struck with large, imposing wings
spread wide to inflict damage.

name: whirlwind
description:
The target is blown away, and a different Pokémon is
dragged out. In the wild, this ends a battle against a
single Pokémon.

name: fly
description:
The user soars, then strikes its target
on the second turn. It can also be
used for flying to any familiar town.

name: bind
description:
Things such as long bodies or tentacles are used to
bind and squeeze the target for four to five turns.

name: slam
description:
The target is slammed with a long tail, vines, or the
like to inflict damage.

name: vine-whip
description:
The target is struck with slender, whiplike vines to
inflict damage.

name: stomp
description:
The target is stomped with a big foot. This may also
make the target flinch.

name: double-kick
description:
The target is quickly kicked twice in succession
using both feet.

name: mega-kick
description:
The target is attacked by a kick launched with
muscle-packed power.

name: jump-kick
description:
The user jumps up high, then strikes with a kick.
If the kick misses, the user hurts itself.

name: rolling-kick
description:
The user lashes out with a quick, spinning kick.
This may also make the target flinch.

name: sand-attack
description:
Sand is hurled in the target’s face, reducing the
target’s accuracy.

name: headbutt
description:
The user sticks out its head and attacks by charging
straight into the target. This may also make the
target flinch.

name: horn-attack
description:
The target is jabbed with a sharply pointed horn to
inflict damage.

name: fury-attack
description:
The target is jabbed repeatedly with a horn or beak
two to five times in a row.

name: horn-drill
description:
The user stabs the target with a horn that rotates
like a drill. The target faints instantly if this
attack hits.

name: tackle
description:
A physical attack in which the user charges and
slams into the target with its whole body.

name: body-slam
description:
The user drops onto the target with its full body
weight. This may also leave the target with paralysis.

name: wrap
description:
A long body, vines, or the like are used to wrap and 
squeeze the target for four to five turns.

name: take-down
description:
A reckless, full-body charge attack for slamming into
the target. This also damages the user a little.

name: thrash
description:
The user rampages and attacks for two
to three turns. It then becomes
confused, however.

name: double-edge
description:
A reckless, life-
risking tackle.
It also damages the
user by a fairly large
amount, however.

name: tail-whip
description:
The user wags its tail cutely, making opposing
Pokémon less wary and lowering their Defense stat.

name: poison-sting
description:
The foe is stabbed
with a poisonous
barb of some sort.
It may also poison
the target.

name: twineedle
description:
The user damages the target twice in succession
by jabbing it with two spikes. This may also poison
the target.

name: pin-missile
description:
Sharp spikes are shot at the target in rapid
succession. They hit two to five times in a row.

name: leer
description:
The opposing team gains an intimidating
leer with sharp eyes. The opposing team’s
Defense stats are reduced.

name: bite
description:
The target is bitten with viciously sharp fangs.
This may also make the target flinch.

name: growl
description:
The user growls in an endearing way,
making the opposing team less wary.
The foes’ Attack stats are lowered.

name: roar
description:
The target is scared off, and a different Pokémon is
dragged out. In the wild, this ends a battle against a
single Pokémon.

name: sing
description:
A soothing lullaby is sung in a calming voice that
puts the target into a deep slumber.

name: supersonic
description:
The user generates odd sound waves from
its body. It may confuse the target.

name: sonic-boom
description:
The target is hit with a destructive shock wave that
always inflicts 20 HP damage.

name: disable
description:
For four turns, this move prevents the target from
using the move it last used.

name: acid
description:
The opposing team is attacked with a spray
of harsh acid. The acid may also lower
the targets’ Sp. Def stats.

name: ember
description:
The target is attacked with small flames. This may
also leave the target with a burn.

name: flamethrower
description:
The target is scorched with an intense blast of fire.
This may also leave the target with a burn.

name: mist
description:
The user cloaks itself and its allies in a white mist
that prevents any of their stats from being lowered
for five turns.

name: water-gun
description:
The foe is struck
with a lot of water
expelled forcibly
from the mouth.

name: hydro-pump
description:
The target is blasted by a huge volume of water
launched under great pressure.

name: surf
description:
The user attacks everything around it by
swamping its surroundings with a giant wave.
This can also be used for crossing water.

name: ice-beam
description:
The target is struck with an icy-cold beam of energy.
This may also leave the target frozen.

name: blizzard
description:
A howling blizzard is summoned to strike opposing
Pokémon. This may also leave the opposing
Pokémon frozen.

name: psybeam
description:
The target is attacked with a peculiar ray. This may
also leave the target confused.

name: bubble-beam
description:
A spray of bubbles is forcefully ejected
at the opposing team. It may also lower
their Speed stats.

name: aurora-beam
description:
The target is hit with a rainbow-colored beam.
This may also lower the target’s Attack stat.

name: hyper-beam
description:
The target is attacked with a powerful
beam. The user must rest on the next
turn to regain its energy.

name: peck
description:
The target is jabbed with a sharply pointed beak
or horn.

name: drill-peck
description:
A corkscrewing
attack with the
sharp beak acting
as a drill.

name: submission
description:
The user grabs the target and recklessly dives for
the ground. This also damages the user a little.

name: low-kick
description:
A powerful low kick that makes the target fall over.
The heavier the target, the greater the
move’s power.

name: counter
description:
A retaliation move that counters any physical attack,
inflicting double the damage taken.

name: seismic-toss
description:
The target is thrown using the power of gravity.
It inflicts damage equal to the user’s level.

name: strength
description:
The target is slugged with a punch thrown
at maximum power. This can also be used
to move heavy boulders.

name: absorb
description:
A nutrient-draining attack. The user’s HP is restored
by half the damage taken by the target.

name: mega-drain
description:
A nutrient-draining attack. The user’s HP is restored
by half the damage taken by the target.

name: leech-seed
description:
A seed is planted on
the foe. It steals
some HP from the foe
to heal the user on
every turn.

name: growth
description:
The user’s body is
forced to grow all at
once. It raises the
Sp. Atk stat.

name: razor-leaf
description:
Sharp-edged leaves are launched to slash at the
opposing Pokémon. Critical hits land more easily.

name: solar-beam
description:
In this two-turn attack, the user gathers light, then
blasts a bundled beam on the next turn.

name: poison-powder
description:
The user scatters a cloud of poisonous
dust on the target. This may also poison
the target.

name: stun-spore
description:
The user scatters a cloud of paralyzing
powder. It may leave the target
with paralysis.

name: sleep-powder
description:
The user scatters a big cloud of sleep-inducing dust
around the target.

name: petal-dance
description:
The user attacks the target by scattering petals for
two to three turns. The user then becomes confused.

name: string-shot
description:
The opposing Pokémon are bound with silk blown
from the user’s mouth that harshly lowers the
Speed stat.

name: dragon-rage
description:
This attack hits the target with a shock wave of
pure rage. This attack always inflicts 40 HP damage.

name: fire-spin
description:
The target becomes trapped within a fierce vortex
of fire that rages for four to five turns.

name: thunder-shock
description:
A jolt of electricity crashes down on the target to
inflict damage. This may also leave the target
with paralysis.

name: thunderbolt
description:
A strong electric blast crashes down on the target.
This may also leave the target with paralysis.

name: thunder-wave
description:
A weak electric charge is launched at
the target. It causes paralysis if it hits.

name: thunder
description:
A wicked thunderbolt is dropped on the target to
inflict damage. This may also leave the target
with paralysis.

name: rock-throw
description:
The user picks up and throws a small rock at the
target to attack.

name: earthquake
description:
The user sets off an
earthquake that hits
all the Pokémon in
the battle.

name: fissure
description:
The user opens up a fissure in the ground and drops
the target in. The target faints instantly if this
attack hits.

name: dig
description:
The user burrows, then attacks
on the second turn.
It can also be used to exit dungeons.

name: toxic
description:
A move that leaves the target badly poisoned.
Its poison damage worsens every turn.

name: confusion
description:
The target is hit by a weak telekinetic
force. It may also leave the
target confused.

name: psychic
description:
The target is hit by a strong telekinetic force.
This may also lower the target’s Sp. Def stat.

name: hypnosis
description:
The user employs hypnotic suggestion to make the
target fall into a deep sleep.

name: meditate
description:
The user meditates to awaken the power deep
within its body and raise its Attack stat.

name: agility
description:
The user relaxes and lightens its body to move
faster. This sharply raises the Speed stat.

name: quick-attack
description:
The user lunges at the target at a speed that makes
it almost invisible. This move always goes first.

name: rage
description:
As long as this move is in use, the power of rage
raises the Attack stat each time the user is hit
in battle.

name: teleport
description:
Use it to flee from
any wild Pokémon.
It may also be used
to warp to the last
Poké Center visited.

name: night-shade
description:
The user makes the target see a frightening mirage.
It inflicts damage equal to the user’s level.

name: mimic
description:
The user copies the target’s last move. The move
can be used during battle until the Pokémon is
switched out.

name: screech
description:
An earsplitting
screech is emitted to
sharply reduce the
foe’s Defense stat.

name: double-team
description:
By moving rapidly, the
user makes illusory
copies of itself to
raise its evasiveness.

name: recover
description:
A self-healing move.
The user restores its
own HP by up to half
of its max HP.

name: harden
description:
The user stiffens all
the muscles in its
body to raise its
Defense stat.

name: minimize
description:
The user compresses its body to make itself look
smaller, which sharply raises its evasiveness.

name: smokescreen
description:
The user releases an obscuring cloud of smoke or
ink. This lowers the target’s accuracy.

name: confuse-ray
description:
The target is exposed to a sinister ray that
triggers confusion.

name: withdraw
description:
The user withdraws
its body into its hard
shell, raising its
Defense stat.

name: defense-curl
description:
The user curls up to
conceal weak spots
and raise its Defense
stat.

name: barrier
description:
The user throws up a
sturdy wall that
sharply raises its
Defense stat.

name: light-screen
description:
A wondrous wall of light is put up to
suppress damage from special attacks
for five turns.

name: haze
description:
The user creates a haze that eliminates every stat
change among all the Pokémon engaged in battle.

name: reflect
description:
A wondrous wall of light is put up to
suppress damage from physical attacks
for five turns.

name: focus-energy
description:
The user takes a
deep breath and
focuses to raise the
critical-hit ratio of
its attacks.

name: bide
description:
The user endures attacks for two turns, then strikes
back to cause double the damage taken.

name: metronome
description:
The user waggles a finger and stimulates its brain
into randomly using nearly any move.

name: mirror-move
description:
The user counters
the foe by mimicking
the move last used
by the foe.

name: self-destruct
description:
The user attacks everything around it by causing an
explosion. The user faints upon using this move.

name: egg-bomb
description:
A large egg is hurled at the target with maximum
force to inflict damage.

name: lick
description:
The target is licked with a long tongue, causing
damage. This may also leave the target
with paralysis.

name: smog
description:
The target is attacked with a discharge of filthy
gases. This may also poison the target.

name: sludge
description:
Unsanitary sludge is hurled at the target. This may
also poison the target.

name: bone-club
description:
The user clubs the target with a bone. This may also
make the target flinch.

name: fire-blast
description:
The target is attacked with an intense blast of
all-consuming fire. This may also leave the target
with a burn.

name: waterfall
description:
The user charges at
the foe rapidly, and
may make it flinch.
It can also be used
to climb a waterfall.

name: clamp
description:
The target is clamped and squeezed by the user’s
very thick and sturdy shell for four to five turns.

name: swift
description:
Star-shaped rays are shot at the opposing Pokémon.
This attack never misses.

name: skull-bash
description:
The user tucks in its head to raise its Defense
stat on the first turn, then rams the target on the
next turn.

name: spike-cannon
description:
Sharp spikes are shot at the target in rapid
succession. They hit two to five times in a row.

name: constrict
description:
The target is attacked with long, creeping tentacles,
vines, or the like. This may also lower the target’s 
Speed stat.

name: amnesia
description:
The user temporarily empties its mind to forget its
concerns. This sharply raises the user’s Sp. Def stat.

name: kinesis
description:
The user distracts the target by bending a spoon.
This lowers the target’s accuracy.

name: soft-boiled
description:
The user restores its own HP
by up to half of its maximum HP.
May also be used in the field to heal HP.

name: high-jump-kick
description:
The target is attacked with a knee kick from a jump.
If it misses, the user is hurt instead.

name: glare
description:
The user intimidates the target with the pattern on
its belly to cause paralysis.

name: dream-eater
description:
The user eats the dreams of a sleeping
target. It absorbs half the damage
caused to heal the user’s HP.

name: poison-gas
description:
A cloud of poison gas is sprayed
in the face of opposing Pokémon.
This may also poison those hit.

name: barrage
description:
Round objects are hurled at the target to strike two
to five times in a row.

name: leech-life
description:
The user drains the target’s blood. The user’s HP is
restored by half the damage taken by the target.

name: lovely-kiss
description:
With a scary face, the user tries to force a kiss on
the target. If it succeeds, the target falls asleep.

name: sky-attack
description:
A second-turn attack move where critical hits land
more easily. This may also make the target flinch.

name: transform
description:
The user transforms into a copy of the target right
down to having the same move set.

name: bubble
description:
A spray of countless bubbles is jetted at
the opposing team. It may also lower the
targets’ Speed stats.

name: dizzy-punch
description:
The target is hit with rhythmically launched
punches. This may also leave the target confused.

name: spore
description:
The user scatters
bursts of fine
spores that induce
sleep.

name: flash
description:
The user flashes a bright light that cuts the
target’s accuracy.
It can also be used to illuminate dark caves.

name: psywave
description:
The target is attacked with an odd 
psychic wave.
The attack varies in intensity.

name: splash
description:
The user just flops
and splashes around
without having any
effect.

name: acid-armor
description:
The user alters its cellular structure to liquefy itself,
sharply raising its Defense stat.

name: crabhammer
description:
The foe is hammered
with a large pincer.
This move has a high
critical-hit ratio.

name: explosion
description:
The user attacks everything around it by causing a
tremendous explosion. The user faints upon using
this move.

name: fury-swipes
description:
The target is raked with sharp claws or
scythes for two to five times in
quick succession.

name: bonemerang
description:
The user throws the bone it holds. The bone loops
around to hit the target twice—coming and going.

name: rest
description:
The user goes to sleep for two turns. This fully
restores the user’s HP and heals any
status conditions.

name: rock-slide
description:
Large boulders are hurled at the opposing Pokémon
to inflict damage. This may also make the opposing
Pokémon flinch.

name: hyper-fang
description:
The user bites hard on the target with its sharp
front fangs. This may also make the target flinch.

name: sharpen
description:
The user reduces its polygon count to
make itself more jagged, raising the
Attack stat.

name: conversion
description:
The user changes its type to become the same type
as the move at the top of the list of moves it knows.

name: tri-attack
description:
The user strikes with a simultaneous
three-beam attack. May also burn, freeze,
or leave the target with paralysis.

name: super-fang
description:
The user chomps hard on the target with its sharp
front fangs. This cuts the target’s HP in half.

name: slash
description:
The target is attacked with a slash of claws or
blades. Critical hits land more easily.

name: substitute
description:
The user makes a copy of itself using some of its HP.
The copy serves as the user’s decoy.

name: struggle
description:
An attack that is used in desperation
only if the user has no PP. This also
damages the user a little.

name: sketch
description:
It enables the user to permanently learn the move
last used by the target. Once used,
Sketch disappears.

name: triple-kick
description:
A consecutive three-
kick attack that
becomes more
powerful with each 
successive hit.

name: thief
description:
The user attacks and steals the target’s held item
simultaneously. The user can’t steal anything if it
already holds an item.

name: spider-web
description:
The user ensnares the target with thin, gooey silk
so it can’t flee from battle.

name: mind-reader
description:
The user senses the target’s movements with its
mind to ensure its next attack does not miss
the target.

name: nightmare
description:
A sleeping foe is
shown a nightmare
that inflicts some
damage every turn.

name: flame-wheel
description:
The user cloaks itself in fire and charges at the
target. This may also leave the target with a burn.

name: snore
description:
An attack that can be used only if the
user is asleep. The harsh noise may also
make the target flinch.

name: curse
description:
A move that works
differently for the
Ghost type than for
all the other types.

name: flail
description:
The user flails about aimlessly to attack. The less HP
the user has, the greater the move’s power.

name: conversion-2
description:
The user changes its type to make itself resistant to
the type of the attack the opponent used last.

name: aeroblast
description:
A vortex of air is shot at the target to inflict damage.
Critical hits land more easily.

name: cotton-spore
description:
The user releases cotton-like spores
that cling to the opposing Pokémon,
which harshly lowers their Speed stats.

name: reversal
description:
An all-out attack
that becomes more
powerful the less
HP the user has.

name: spite
description:
The user unleashes its grudge on the move last used
by the target by cutting 4 PP from it.

name: powder-snow
description:
The user attacks with a chilling gust of powdery
snow. This may also freeze the opposing Pokémon.

name: protect
description:
It enables the user to evade all attacks.
Its chance of failing rises if it is used in
succession.

name: mach-punch
description:
The user throws a punch at blinding
speed. It is certain to strike first.

name: scary-face
description:
The user frightens the target with a scary
face to harshly reduce its Speed stat.

name: feint-attack
description:
The user approaches the target disarmingly, then
throws a sucker punch. This attack never misses.

name: sweet-kiss
description:
The user kisses the target with a sweet, angelic
cuteness that causes confusion.

name: belly-drum
description:
The user maximizes its Attack stat in exchange for
HP equal to half its max HP.

name: sludge-bomb
description:
The user attacks by
hurling filthy sludge
at the foe.
It may also poison
the target.

name: mud-slap
description:
The user hurls mud in the target’s face to inflict
damage and lower its accuracy.

name: octazooka
description:
The user attacks by spraying ink in the target’s face
or eyes. This may also lower the target’s accuracy.

name: spikes
description:
The user lays a trap of spikes at the opposing
team’s feet. The trap hurts Pokémon that switch
into battle.

name: zap-cannon
description:
The user fires an electric blast like a cannon to inflict
damage and cause paralysis.

name: foresight
description:
Enables a Ghost-type target to be hit by Normal-
and Fighting-type attacks. This also enables an
evasive target to be hit.

name: destiny-bond
description:
After using this move, if the user faints, the
Pokémon that landed the knockout hit also faints.
Its chance of failing rises if it is used in succession.

name: perish-song
description:
Any Pokémon that hears this song faints in three
turns, unless it switches out of battle.

name: icy-wind
description:
The user attacks with a gust of chilled air. This also
lowers the opposing Pokémon’s Speed stats.

name: detect
description:
It enables the user to evade all attacks.
Its chance of failing rises if it is used
in succession.

name: bone-rush
description:
The user strikes at
the foe with a hard
bone two to five
times in a row.

name: lock-on
description:
The user takes sure aim at the target.
It ensures the next attack does not fail
to hit the target.

name: outrage
description:
The user rampages and attacks for two
to three turns.
It then becomes confused, however.

name: sandstorm
description:
A five-turn sandstorm is summoned to hurt all
combatants except the Rock, Ground, and
Steel types. It raises the Sp. Def stat of Rock types.

name: giga-drain
description:
A nutrient-draining attack. The user’s HP is restored
by half the damage taken by the target.

name: endure
description:
The user endures any attack with at least 1 HP.
Its chance of failing rises if it is used in succession.

name: charm
description:
The user gazes at the target rather
charmingly, making it less wary.
The target’s Attack is harshly lowered.

name: rollout
description:
The user continually rolls into the target over five
turns. It becomes more powerful each time it hits.

name: false-swipe
description:
A restrained attack that prevents the target from
fainting. The target is left with at least 1 HP.

name: swagger
description:
The user enrages and confuses the target. However,
this also sharply raises the target’s Attack stat.

name: milk-drink
description:
The user restores its own HP
by up to half of its maximum HP.
May also be used in the field to heal HP.

name: spark
description:
The user throws an electrically charged tackle at the
target. This may also leave the target with paralysis.

name: fury-cutter
description:
The target is slashed with scythes or claws. This
attack becomes more powerful if it hits
in succession.

name: steel-wing
description:
The target is hit with wings of steel. This may also
raise the user’s Defense stat.

name: mean-look
description:
The user pins the target with a dark, arresting look.
The target becomes unable to flee.

name: attract
description:
If it is the opposite gender of the user, the target
becomes infatuated and less likely to attack.

name: sleep-talk
description:
While it is asleep, the
user randomly uses
one of the moves it
knows.

name: heal-bell
description:
The user makes a soothing bell chime to heal the
status conditions of all the party Pokémon.

name: return
description:
A full-power attack that grows more
powerful the more the user likes
its Trainer.

name: present
description:
The user attacks by giving the target a gift with a
hidden trap. It restores HP sometimes, however.

name: frustration
description:
A full-power attack that grows more
powerful the less the user likes
its Trainer.

name: safeguard
description:
The user creates a protective field that prevents
status conditions for five turns.

name: pain-split
description:
The user adds its HP to the target’s HP, then equally
shares the combined HP with the target.

name: sacred-fire
description:
The target is razed with a mystical fire of great
intensity. This may also leave the target with a burn.

name: magnitude
description:
The user looses a ground-shaking quake
affecting everyone around the user.
Its power varies.

name: dynamic-punch
description:
The user punches the target with full, concentrated
power. This confuses the target if it hits.

name: megahorn
description:
Utilizing its tough
and impressive
horn, the user
rams into the foe 
with no letup.

name: dragon-breath
description:
The user exhales a mighty gust that inflicts damage.
This may also leave the target with paralysis.

name: baton-pass
description:
The user switches places with a party Pokémon in
waiting and passes along any stat changes.

name: encore
description:
The user compels the
foe to keep using
only the move it last
used for three to
seven turns.

name: pursuit
description:
The power of this attack move is doubled if it’s used
on a target that’s switching out of battle.

name: rapid-spin
description:
A spin attack that can also eliminate such moves as
Bind, Wrap, Leech Seed, and Spikes.

name: sweet-scent
description:
A sweet scent that harshly lowers opposing
Pokémon’s evasiveness. This also lures wild
Pokémon if used in places such as tall grass.

name: iron-tail
description:
The target is slammed with a steel-hard tail.
This may also lower the target’s Defense stat.

name: metal-claw
description:
The target is raked with steel claws. This may also
raise the user’s Attack stat.

name: vital-throw
description:
The user allows the
foe to attack first.
In return, this throw
move is guaranteed
not to miss.

name: morning-sun
description:
The user restores its own HP. The amount of HP
regained varies with the weather.

name: synthesis
description:
The user restores its own HP. The amount of HP
regained varies with the weather.

name: moonlight
description:
The user restores its own HP. The amount of HP
regained varies with the weather.

name: hidden-power
description:
A unique attack that varies in type and
intensity depending on the Pokémon
using it.

name: cross-chop
description:
The user delivers a
double chop with its
forearms crossed.
It has a high
critical-hit ratio.

name: twister
description:
The user whips up a vicious tornado to tear at the
opposing Pokémon. This may also make them flinch.

name: rain-dance
description:
The user summons a heavy rain that falls for five
turns, powering up Water-type moves. It lowers
the power of Fire-type moves.

name: sunny-day
description:
The user intensifies the sun for five turns, powering
up Fire-type moves. It lowers the power of
Water-type moves.

name: crunch
description:
The user crunches up the target with sharp fangs.
This may also lower the target’s Defense stat.

name: mirror-coat
description:
A retaliation move that counters any special attack,
inflicting double the damage taken.

name: psych-up
description:
The user hypnotizes itself into copying any stat
change made by the target.

name: extreme-speed
description:
The user charges the target at blinding
speed. This attack always goes
before any other move.

name: ancient-power
description:
The user attacks with a prehistoric power.
This may also raise all the user’s stats at once.

name: shadow-ball
description:
The user hurls a shadowy blob at the target.
This may also lower the target’s Sp. Def stat.

name: future-sight
description:
Two turns after this
move is used, the foe
is attacked with a
hunk of psychic
energy.

name: rock-smash
description:
The user attacks with a punch.
This may also lower the target’s Defense stat.
This move can also shatter rocks in the field.

name: whirlpool
description:
Traps the foe inside a
whirlpool that lasts
for two to five turns.
The user can pass
through whirlpools.

name: beat-up
description:
The user gets all party Pokémon to attack the target.
The more party Pokémon, the greater the number
of attacks.

name: fake-out
description:
An attack that hits first and makes the
target flinch. It only works the first turn
the user is in battle.

name: uproar
description:
The user attacks in an uproar for three turns.
During that time, no Pokémon can fall asleep.

name: stockpile
description:
The user charges up power and raises both its
Defense and Sp. Def stats. The move can be used
three times.

name: spit-up
description:
The power stored using the move Stockpile is
released at once in an attack. The more power
is stored, the greater the move’s power.

name: swallow
description:
The power stored using the move Stockpile is
absorbed by the user to heal its HP. Storing more
power heals more HP.

name: heat-wave
description:
The user attacks by exhaling hot breath on the
opposing Pokémon. This may also leave those
Pokémon with a burn.

name: hail
description:
The user summons a hailstorm lasting five turns.
It damages all Pokémon except the Ice type.

name: torment
description:
The user torments and enrages the target, making it
incapable of using the same move twice in a row.

name: flatter
description:
Flattery is used to confuse the target. However,
this also raises the target’s Sp. Atk stat.

name: will-o-wisp
description:
The user shoots a sinister, bluish-white flame at the
target to inflict a burn.

name: memento
description:
The user faints when using this move. In return, this
harshly lowers the target’s Attack and Sp. Atk stats.

name: facade
description:
An attack move that doubles its power if
the user is poisoned, burned, or
has paralysis.

name: focus-punch
description:
The user focuses its mind before launching a punch.
This move fails if the user is hit before it is used.

name: smelling-salts
description:
This attack’s power is doubled when used on a
target with paralysis. This also cures the target’s
paralysis, however.

name: follow-me
description:
The user draws attention to itself, making all targets
take aim only at the user.

name: nature-power
description:
An attack that makes use of nature’s
power. Its effects vary depending on the
user’s environment.

name: charge
description:
The user boosts the power of the Electric move it
uses on the next turn. This also raises the user’s
Sp. Def stat.

name: taunt
description:
The foe is taunted
into a rage that
allows it to use only
attack moves for two
to four turns.

name: helping-hand
description:
A move that boosts
the power of the
ally’s attack in a
Double Battle.

name: trick
description:
The user catches the
foe off guard and
swaps the foe’s held
item with its own.

name: role-play
description:
The user mimics the target completely, copying the
target’s natural Ability.

name: wish
description:
One turn after this move is used, the user’s or its
replacement’s HP is restored by half the user’s
max HP.

name: assist
description:
The user hurriedly and randomly
uses a move among those known
by other Pokémon in the party.

name: ingrain
description:
The user lays roots that restore
its HP on every turn. Because it is
rooted, it can’t switch out.

name: superpower
description:
The user attacks the target with great power.
However, this also lowers the user’s Attack and
Defense stats.

name: magic-coat
description:
A barrier reflects back to the target moves like
Leech Seed and moves that damage status.

name: recycle
description:
The user recycles a
single-use item that
has been used in
battle so it can be
used again.

name: revenge
description:
An attack move that inflicts double the
damage if the user has been hurt by the
opponent in the same turn.

name: brick-break
description:
The user attacks with
tough fists, etc. It
can also break any
barrier such as Light
Screen and Reflect.

name: yawn
description:
The user lets loose a huge yawn that lulls the target
into falling asleep on the next turn.

name: knock-off
description:
The user slaps down the target’s held item, and that
item can’t be used in that battle. The move does
more damage if the target has a held item.

name: endeavor
description:
An attack move that cuts down the
target’s HP to equal the user’s HP.

name: eruption
description:
The user attacks the opposing team with
explosive fury. The lower the user’s HP,
the less powerful this attack becomes.

name: skill-swap
description:
The user employs its psychic power to exchange
Abilities with the target.

name: imprison
description:
If the opponents know any move also known
by the user, the opponents are prevented
from using it.

name: refresh
description:
A self-healing move
that cures the user
of a poisoning,
burn, or paralysis.

name: grudge
description:
If the user faints, the user’s grudge fully depletes
the PP of the opponent’s move that knocked it out.

name: snatch
description:
The user steals the effects of any
healing or stat-changing move the
opponent attempts to use.

name: secret-power
description:
The user attacks the target with a
secret power. Its additional effects vary
depending on the user’s environment.

name: dive
description:
Diving on the first turn, the user floats
up and attacks on the second turn.
It can be used to dive deep in the ocean.

name: arm-thrust
description:
The user lets loose a flurry of open-palmed arm
thrusts that hit two to five times in a row.

name: camouflage
description:
The user’s type is changed depending on its
environment, such as at water’s edge, in grass, or in
a cave.

name: tail-glow
description:
The user stares at flashing lights to focus its mind,
drastically raising its Sp. Atk stat.

name: luster-purge
description:
The user lets loose a damaging burst of light. This
may also lower the target’s Sp. Def stat.

name: mist-ball
description:
A mist-like flurry of down envelops and damages the
target. This may also lower the target’s Sp. Atk stat.

name: feather-dance
description:
The user covers the target’s body with a mass of
down that harshly lowers its Attack stat.

name: teeter-dance
description:
The user performs a
wobbly dance that
confuses all the
Pokémon in battle.

name: blaze-kick
description:
The user launches a kick that lands a critical hit
more easily. This may also leave the target with
a burn.

name: mud-sport
description:
The user covers
itself with mud. It
weakens Electric-
type moves while the
user is in the battle.

name: ice-ball
description:
The user continually rolls into the target
over five turns. It becomes stronger
each time it hits.

name: needle-arm
description:
The user attacks by wildly swinging its thorny arms.
This may also make the target flinch.

name: slack-off
description:
The user slacks off,
restoring its own HP
by up to half of its
maximum HP.

name: hyper-voice
description:
The user lets loose a horribly echoing shout with
the power to inflict damage.

name: poison-fang
description:
The user bites the target with toxic fangs. This may
also leave the target badly poisoned.

name: crush-claw
description:
The user slashes the target with hard and sharp
claws. This may also lower the target’s Defense stat.

name: blast-burn
description:
The target is razed by a fiery explosion.
The user must rest on the
next turn, however.

name: hydro-cannon
description:
The target is hit with a watery blast.
The user must rest on the
next turn, however.

name: meteor-mash
description:
The target is hit with a hard punch fired like a
meteor. This may also raise the user’s Attack stat.

name: astonish
description:
The user attacks the target while shouting in a
startling fashion. This may also make the
target flinch.

name: weather-ball
description:
An attack move that
varies in power and
type depending on
the weather.

name: aromatherapy
description:
The user releases a soothing scent that heals all
status conditions affecting the user’s party.

name: fake-tears
description:
The user feigns
crying to make the
foe feel flustered,
sharply lowering its
Sp. Def stat.

name: air-cutter
description:
The user launches razor-like wind to slash the
opposing Pokémon. Critical hits land more easily.

name: overheat
description:
The user attacks the target at full power.
The attack’s recoil harshly reduces the
user’s Sp. Atk stat.

name: odor-sleuth
description:
Enables a Ghost-type target to be hit by Normal-
and Fighting-type attacks. This also enables an
evasive target to be hit.

name: rock-tomb
description:
Boulders are hurled at the target. This also lowers
the target’s Speed stat by preventing its movement.

name: silver-wind
description:
The target is attacked with powdery scales blown
by the wind. This may also raise all the user’s stats.

name: metal-sound
description:
A horrible sound like
scraping metal is
emitted to sharply
reduce the foe’s
Sp. Def stat.

name: grass-whistle
description:
The user plays a pleasant melody that lulls the
target into a deep sleep.

name: tickle
description:
The user tickles the target into laughing, reducing its
Attack and Defense stats.

name: cosmic-power
description:
The user absorbs a mystical power from space to
raise its Defense and Sp. Def stats.

name: water-spout
description:
The user spouts water to damage the
opposing team. The lower the user’s HP,
the less powerful it becomes.

name: signal-beam
description:
The user attacks with a sinister beam of light.
This may also confuse the target.

name: shadow-punch
description:
The user throws a
punch at the foe from
the shadows.
The punch lands
without fail.

name: extrasensory
description:
The user attacks with an odd, unseeable power.
This may also make the target flinch.

name: sky-uppercut
description:
The user attacks the target with an uppercut thrown
skyward with force.

name: sand-tomb
description:
The user traps the target inside a harshly raging
sandstorm for four to five turns.

name: sheer-cold
description:
The target faints instantly. It’s less likely to hit the
target if it’s used by Pokémon other than Ice types.

name: muddy-water
description:
The user attacks by shooting muddy water
at the opposing team.
It may also lower the targets’ accuracy.

name: bullet-seed
description:
The user forcefully shoots seeds at the
target. Two to five seeds are shot in
rapid succession.

name: aerial-ace
description:
The user confounds the target with speed,
then slashes.
The attack lands without fail.

name: icicle-spear
description:
The user launches sharp icicles at the
target. It strikes two to five times in
a row.

name: iron-defense
description:
The user hardens its body’s surface like iron,
sharply raising its Defense stat.

name: block
description:
The user blocks the target’s way with arms spread
wide to prevent escape.

name: howl
description:
The user howls loudly to raise its spirit, which raises
its Attack stat.

name: dragon-claw
description:
Sharp, huge claws
hook and slash the
foe quickly and
with great power.

name: frenzy-plant
description:
The user slams the target with an enormous tree.
The user can’t move on the next turn.

name: bulk-up
description:
The user tenses its muscles to bulk up
its body, boosting both its Attack and
Defense stats.

name: bounce
description:
The user bounces up high, then drops on the target
on the second turn. This may also leave the target
with paralysis.

name: mud-shot
description:
The user attacks by hurling a blob of mud at the
target. This also lowers the target’s Speed stat.

name: poison-tail
description:
The user hits the target with its tail. This may also
poison the target. Critical hits land more easily.

name: covet
description:
The user endearingly
approaches the foe,
then steals the item
the foe is holding.

name: volt-tackle
description:
The user electrifies itself and charges the target.
This also damages the user quite a lot. This attack
may leave the target with paralysis.

name: magical-leaf
description:
The user scatters curious leaves
that chase the target.
This attack will not miss.

name: water-sport
description:
The user soaks itself with water. The move
weakens Fire-type moves while the user
is in the battle.

name: calm-mind
description:
The user quietly focuses its mind and calms its
spirit to raise its Sp. Atk and Sp. Def stats.

name: leaf-blade
description:
The user handles a sharp leaf like a sword and
attacks by cutting its target. Critical hits land
more easily.

name: dragon-dance
description:
The user vigorously performs a mystic, powerful
dance that raises its Attack and Speed stats.

name: rock-blast
description:
The user hurls hard rocks at the target.
Two to five rocks are launched in quick
succession.

name: shock-wave
description:
The user strikes the target with a quick
jolt of electricity.
This attack cannot be evaded.

name: water-pulse
description:
The user attacks the target with a pulsing blast of
water. This may also confuse the target.

name: doom-desire
description:
Two turns after this move is used, the
user blasts the target with a
concentrated bundle of light.

name: psycho-boost
description:
The user attacks the target at full power.
The attack’s recoil harshly reduces the
user’s Sp. Atk stat.

name: roost
description:
The user lands and rests its body. It restores the
user’s HP by up to half of its max HP.

name: gravity
description:
Enables Flying-type Pokémon or Pokémon with the
Levitate Ability to be hit by Ground-type moves.
Flying moves can’t be used.

name: miracle-eye
description:
Enables a Dark-type target to be hit by
Psychic-type attacks. This also enables an evasive
target to be hit.

name: wake-up-slap
description:
This attack inflicts big damage on a sleeping target.
This also wakes the target up, however.

name: hammer-arm
description:
The user swings and hits with its strong
and heavy fist.
It lowers the user’s Speed, however.

name: gyro-ball
description:
The user tackles the target with a high-speed spin.
The slower the user compared to the target, the
greater the move’s power.

name: healing-wish
description:
The user faints. In return, the Pokémon taking its
place will have its HP restored and status
conditions cured.

name: brine
description:
If the target’s HP is down to about half,
this attack will hit with double
the power.

name: natural-gift
description:
The user draws power to attack by using its held
Berry. The Berry determines the move’s type
and power.

name: feint
description:
This attack hits a target using a move such as
Protect or Detect.
This also lifts the effects of those moves.

name: pluck
description:
The user pecks the target. If the target is holding a
Berry, the user eats it and gains its effect.

name: tailwind
description:
The user whips up a turbulent whirlwind that ups
the Speed stat of the user and its allies for
four turns.

name: acupressure
description:
The user applies pressure to stress points, sharply
boosting one of its or its allies’ stats.

name: metal-burst
description:
The user retaliates with much greater force against
the opponent that last inflicted damage on it.

name: u-turn
description:
After making its attack, the user rushes back to
switch places with a party Pokémon in waiting.

name: close-combat
description:
The user fights the target up close without guarding
itself. This also lowers the user’s Defense and
Sp. Def stats.

name: payback
description:
The user stores power, then attacks. If the user
moves after the target, this attack’s power will
be doubled.

name: assurance
description:
If the target has already taken some damage in the
same turn, this attack’s power is doubled.

name: embargo
description:
This move prevents the target from using its held
item for five turns. Its Trainer is also prevented from
using items on it.

name: fling
description:
The user flings its held item at the target to attack.
This move’s power and effects depend on the item.

name: psycho-shift
description:
Using its psychic power of suggestion, the user
transfers its status conditions to the target.

name: trump-card
description:
The fewer PP this
move has, the more
power it has for
attack.

name: heal-block
description:
For five turns, the user prevents the opposing team
from using any moves, Abilities, or held items that
recover HP.

name: wring-out
description:
The user powerfully wrings the target.
The more HP the target has, the greater
this attack’s power.

name: power-trick
description:
The user employs its psychic power to switch its
Attack stat with its Defense stat.

name: gastro-acid
description:
The user hurls up its stomach acids on the target.
The fluid eliminates the effect of the target’s Ability.

name: lucky-chant
description:
The user chants an incantation toward the sky,
preventing opposing Pokémon from landing
critical hits for five turns.

name: me-first
description:
The user cuts ahead of the target to steal and
use the target’s intended move with greater power.
This move fails if it isn’t used first.

name: copycat
description:
The user mimics the move used immediately before
it. The move fails if no other move has been
used yet.

name: power-swap
description:
The user employs its psychic power to switch
changes to its Attack and Sp. Atk stats with
the target.

name: guard-swap
description:
The user employs its psychic power to switch
changes to its Defense and Sp. Def stats with
the target.

name: punishment
description:
The more the target has powered up with stat
changes, the greater the move’s power.

name: last-resort
description:
This move can be used only after the user has used
all the other moves it knows in the battle.

name: worry-seed
description:
A seed that causes worry is planted on the target.
It prevents sleep by making the target’s
Ability Insomnia.

name: sucker-punch
description:
This move enables the user to attack
first. It fails if the target is not
readying an attack, however.

name: toxic-spikes
description:
The user lays a trap of poison spikes at the feet of
the opposing team. The spikes will poison opposing
Pokémon that switch into battle.

name: heart-swap
description:
The user employs its psychic power to switch stat
changes with the target.

name: aqua-ring
description:
The user envelops itself in a veil made
of water. It regains some HP on
every turn.

name: magnet-rise
description:
The user levitates
using electrically
generated magnetism
for five turns.

name: flare-blitz
description:
The user cloaks itself in fire and charges the target.
This also damages the user quite a lot. This attack
may leave the target with a burn.

name: force-palm
description:
The target is attacked with a shock wave. This may
also leave the target with paralysis.

name: aura-sphere
description:
The user lets loose a blast of aura power from deep
within its body at the target. This attack
never misses.

name: rock-polish
description:
The user polishes its body to reduce drag.
This can sharply raise the Speed stat.

name: poison-jab
description:
The target is stabbed with a tentacle or arm steeped
in poison. This may also poison the target.

name: dark-pulse
description:
The user releases a horrible aura imbued with dark
thoughts. This may also make the target flinch.

name: night-slash
description:
The user slashes the target the instant an
opportunity arises. Critical hits land more easily.

name: aqua-tail
description:
The user attacks by
swinging its tail as if
it were a vicious wave
in a raging storm.

name: seed-bomb
description:
The user slams a barrage of hard-shelled seeds
down on the target from above.

name: air-slash
description:
The user attacks with a blade of air that slices even
the sky. This may also make the target flinch.

name: x-scissor
description:
The user slashes at the target by crossing its
scythes or claws as if they were a pair of scissors.

name: bug-buzz
description:
The user vibrates its wings to generate a
damaging sound wave. This may also lower
the target’s Sp. Def stat.

name: dragon-pulse
description:
The target is attacked with a shock wave generated
by the user’s gaping mouth.

name: dragon-rush
description:
The user tackles the target while exhibiting
overwhelming menace. This may also make the
target flinch.

name: power-gem
description:
The user attacks with
a ray of light that
sparkles as if it were
made of gemstones.

name: drain-punch
description:
An energy-draining punch. The user’s HP is restored
by half the damage taken by the target.

name: vacuum-wave
description:
The user whirls its fists to send a wave of pure
vacuum at the target. This move always goes first.

name: focus-blast
description:
The user heightens its mental focus and unleashes
its power. This may also lower the target’s 
Sp. Def stat.

name: energy-ball
description:
The user draws power from nature and fires it at the
target. This may also lower the target’s Sp. Def stat.

name: brave-bird
description:
The user tucks in its wings and charges from a low
altitude. This also damages the user quite a lot.

name: earth-power
description:
The user makes the ground under the target erupt
with power. This may also lower the target’s 
Sp. Def stat.

name: switcheroo
description:
The user trades held items with the target faster
than the eye can follow.

name: giga-impact
description:
The user charges at the target using every bit of its
power. The user can’t move on the next turn.

name: nasty-plot
description:
The user stimulates its brain by thinking bad
thoughts. This sharply raises the user’s Sp. Atk stat.

name: bullet-punch
description:
The user strikes the target with tough punches as
fast as bullets. This move always goes first.

name: avalanche
description:
An attack move that inflicts double the
damage if the user has been hurt by the
target in the same turn.

name: ice-shard
description:
The user flash-freezes chunks of ice and hurls them
at the target. This move always goes first.

name: shadow-claw
description:
The user slashes with
a sharp claw made
from shadows.
It has a high
critical-hit ratio.

name: thunder-fang
description:
The user bites with electrified fangs. This may also
make the target flinch or leave it with paralysis.

name: ice-fang
description:
The user bites with cold-infused fangs. This may
also make the target flinch or leave it frozen.

name: fire-fang
description:
The user bites with flame-cloaked fangs. This may
also make the target flinch or leave it with a burn.

name: shadow-sneak
description:
The user extends its shadow and attacks the target
from behind. This move always goes first.

name: mud-bomb
description:
The user launches a hard-packed mud ball to attack.
This may also lower the target’s accuracy.

name: psycho-cut
description:
The user tears at the target with blades formed by
psychic power. Critical hits land more easily.

name: zen-headbutt
description:
The user focuses its willpower to its head and
attacks the target. This may also make the
target flinch.

name: mirror-shot
description:
The user lets loose a flash of energy at the target
from its polished body. This may also lower the
target’s accuracy.

name: flash-cannon
description:
The user gathers all its light energy and releases it
all at once. This may also lower the target’s
Sp. Def stat.

name: rock-climb
description:
The user attacks the target by smashing into it with
incredible force. This may also confuse the target.

name: defog
description:
A strong wind blows away the target’s barriers such
as Reflect or Light Screen. This also lowers the
target’s evasiveness.

name: trick-room
description:
The user creates a bizarre area in which slower
Pokémon get to move first for five turns.

name: draco-meteor
description:
Comets are summoned down from the sky
onto the target. The attack’s recoil
harshly reduces the user’s Sp. Atk stat.

name: discharge
description:
The user strikes everything around it by letting loose
a flare of electricity. This may also cause paralysis.

name: lava-plume
description:
The user torches everything around it in an inferno
of scarlet flames. This may also leave those it hits
with a burn.

name: leaf-storm
description:
The user whips up a storm of leaves around
the target. The attack’s recoil harshly
reduces the user’s Sp. Atk stat.

name: power-whip
description:
The user violently whirls its vines, tentacles, or the 
like to harshly lash the target.

name: rock-wrecker
description:
The user launches a huge boulder at the
target to attack. It must rest on the
next turn, however.

name: cross-poison
description:
A slashing attack with a poisonous blade
that may also leave the target poisoned.
Critical hits land more easily.

name: gunk-shot
description:
The user shoots filthy garbage at the target to
attack. This may also poison the target.

name: iron-head
description:
The user slams the target with its steel-hard head.
This may also make the target flinch.

name: magnet-bomb
description:
The user launches a
steel bomb that
sticks to the target.
This attack will not
miss.

name: stone-edge
description:
The user stabs the target from below with
sharpened stones. Critical hits land more easily.

name: captivate
description:
If any opposing Pokémon is the opposite gender of
the user, it is charmed, which harshly lowers its
Sp. Atk stat.

name: stealth-rock
description:
The user lays a trap of levitating stones around the
opposing team. The trap hurts opposing Pokémon
that switch into battle.

name: grass-knot
description:
The user snares the target with grass and trips it.
The heavier the target, the greater the
move’s power.

name: chatter
description:
The user attacks using a sound wave
based on words it has learned.
It may also confuse the target.

name: judgment
description:
The user releases countless shots of light at the
target. This move’s type varies depending on the
kind of Plate the user is holding.

name: bug-bite
description:
The user bites the target. If the target is holding a
Berry, the user eats it and gains its effect.

name: charge-beam
description:
The user attacks with an electric charge. The user
may use any remaining electricity to raise its
Sp. Atk stat.

name: wood-hammer
description:
The user slams its rugged body into the target to
attack. This also damages the user quite a lot.

name: aqua-jet
description:
The user lunges at the target at a speed that makes
it almost invisible. This move always goes first.

name: attack-order
description:
The user calls out its underlings to pummel the
target. Critical hits land more easily.

name: defend-order
description:
The user calls out
its underlings to
make a living shield,
raising its Defense
and Sp. Def stats.

name: heal-order
description:
The user calls out its underlings to heal it. The user
regains up to half of its max HP.

name: head-smash
description:
The user attacks the target with a hazardous,
full-power headbutt. This also damages the
user terribly.

name: double-hit
description:
The user slams the target with a long tail, vines, or a
tentacle. The target is hit twice in a row.

name: roar-of-time
description:
The user blasts the target with power that distorts
even time. The user can’t move on the next turn.

name: spacial-rend
description:
The user tears the
foe along with the
space around it.
This move has a high
critical-hit ratio.

name: lunar-dance
description:
The user faints. In return, the Pokémon taking its
place will have its status and HP fully restored.

name: crush-grip
description:
The target is crushed with great force. The more HP
the target has left, the greater this move’s power.

name: magma-storm
description:
The target becomes trapped within a maelstrom of
fire that rages for four to five turns.

name: dark-void
description:
Opposing Pokémon are dragged into a world of total
darkness that makes them sleep.

name: seed-flare
description:
The user emits a shock wave from its body to attack
its target. This may also harshly lower the target’s
Sp. Def stat.

name: ominous-wind
description:
The user blasts the target with a gust of repulsive
wind. This may also raise all the user’s stats at once.

name: shadow-force
description:
The user disappears, then strikes the target on the
next turn. This move hits even if the target
protects itself.

name: hone-claws
description:
The user sharpens its claws to boost its Attack stat
and accuracy.

name: wide-guard
description:
The user and its allies are protected from
wide-ranging attacks for one turn. If used
in succession, its chance of failing rises.

name: guard-split
description:
The user employs its psychic power to
average its Defense and Sp. Def stats
with those of its target’s.

name: power-split
description:
The user employs its psychic power to
average its Attack and Sp. Atk stats
with those of the target’s.

name: wonder-room
description:
The user creates a bizarre area in which Pokémon’s
Defense and Sp. Def stats are swapped for
five turns.

name: psyshock
description:
The user materializes an odd psychic wave to attack
the target. This attack does physical damage.

name: venoshock
description:
The user drenches the target in a special poisonous
liquid. This move’s power is doubled if the target
is poisoned.

name: autotomize
description:
The user sheds part of its body to make itself lighter
and sharply raise its Speed stat.

name: rage-powder
description:
The user scatters a cloud of irritating powder to
draw attention to itself. Opponents aim only at
the user.

name: telekinesis
description:
The user makes the target float with its psychic
power. The target is easier to hit for three turns.

name: magic-room
description:
The user creates a bizarre area in which Pokémon’s
held items lose their effects for five turns.

name: smack-down
description:
The user throws a stone or similar projectile to
attack an opponent. A flying Pokémon will fall to the
ground when it’s hit.

name: storm-throw
description:
The user strikes the target with a fierce blow. This
attack always results in a critical hit.

name: flame-burst
description:
The user attacks the target with a bursting flame.
The bursting flame damages Pokémon next to the
target as well.

name: sludge-wave
description:
The user strikes everything around it by swamping
the area with a giant sludge wave. This may also
poison those hit.

name: quiver-dance
description:
The user lightly performs a beautiful, mystic dance.
This boosts the user’s Sp. Atk, Sp. Def, and
Speed stats.

name: heavy-slam
description:
The user slams into the target with its heavy body.
The more the user outweighs the target, the greater
the move’s power.

name: synchronoise
description:
Using an odd shock wave, the user inflicts damage
on any Pokémon of the same type in the area
around it.

name: electro-ball
description:
The user hurls an electric orb at the target. The
faster the user is than the target, the greater the
move’s power.

name: soak
description:
The user shoots a torrent of water at the target and
changes the target’s type to Water.

name: flame-charge
description:
Cloaking itself in flame, the user attacks. Then,
building up more power, the user raises its
Speed stat.

name: coil
description:
The user coils up and concentrates. This raises its
Attack and Defense stats as well as its accuracy.

name: low-sweep
description:
The user makes a swift attack on the target’s legs,
which lowers the target’s Speed stat.

name: acid-spray
description:
The user spits fluid that works to melt
the target. This harshly reduces
the target’s Sp. Def stat.

name: foul-play
description:
The user turns the target’s power against it. The
higher the target’s Attack stat, the greater the
move’s power.

name: simple-beam
description:
The user’s mysterious psychic wave changes the
target’s Ability to Simple.

name: entrainment
description:
The user dances with an odd rhythm that compels
the target to mimic it, making the target’s Ability
the same as the user’s.

name: after-you
description:
The user helps the target and makes it use its move
right after the user.

name: round
description:
The user attacks the target with a song.
Others can join in the Round and make
the attack do greater damage.

name: echoed-voice
description:
The user attacks the target with an echoing voice.
If this move is used every turn, its power
is increased.

name: chip-away
description:
Looking for an opening, the user strikes consistently.
The target’s stat changes don’t affect this
attack’s damage.

name: clear-smog
description:
The user attacks by throwing a clump of
special mud. All status changes are
returned to normal.

name: stored-power
description:
The user attacks the target with stored power. The
more the user’s stats are raised, the greater the
move’s power.

name: quick-guard
description:
The user protects itself and its allies
from priority moves. If used in
succession, its chance of failing rises.

name: ally-switch
description:
The user teleports using a strange power
and switches its place with one of
its allies.

name: scald
description:
The user shoots boiling hot water at its target.
This may also leave the target with a burn.

name: shell-smash
description:
The user breaks its shell, which lowers Defense and
Sp. Def stats but sharply raises its Attack, Sp. Atk,
and Speed stats.

name: heal-pulse
description:
The user emits a healing pulse which
restores the target’s HP by up to
half of its max HP.

name: hex
description:
This relentless attack does massive damage to a
target affected by status conditions.

name: sky-drop
description:
The user takes the target into the sky, then drops it
during the next turn. The target cannot attack while
in the sky.

name: shift-gear
description:
The user rotates its gears, raising its Attack stat and
sharply raising its Speed stat.

name: circle-throw
description:
The target is thrown, and a different Pokémon is
dragged out. In the wild, this ends a battle against
a single Pokémon.

name: incinerate
description:
The user attacks opposing Pokémon with fire.
If a Pokémon is holding a certain item, such as a
Berry, the item becomes burned up and unusable.

name: quash
description:
The user suppresses the target and makes its move
go last.

name: acrobatics
description:
The user nimbly strikes the target. If the user is not
holding an item, this attack inflicts massive damage.

name: reflect-type
description:
The user reflects the target’s type, making it the
same type as the target.

name: retaliate
description:
The user gets revenge for a fainted ally.
If an ally fainted in the previous turn,
this move becomes more powerful.

name: final-gambit
description:
The user risks everything to attack its
target. The user faints but does damage
equal to the user’s HP.

name: bestow
description:
The user passes its held item to the target when the
target isn’t holding an item.

name: inferno
description:
The user attacks by engulfing the target in an
intense fire. This leaves the target with a burn.

name: water-pledge
description:
A column of water strikes the target. When
combined with its fire equivalent, the
damage increases and a rainbow appears.

name: fire-pledge
description:
A column of fire hits the target. When used with
its grass equivalent, its damage increases and
a vast sea of fire appears.

name: grass-pledge
description:
A column of grass hits the target. When used with
its water equivalent, its damage increases and
a vast swamp appears.

name: volt-switch
description:
After making its attack, the user rushes back to
switch places with a party Pokémon in waiting.

name: struggle-bug
description:
While resisting, the user attacks the opposing
Pokémon. This lowers the Sp. Atk stat of those hit.

name: bulldoze
description:
The user strikes everything around it by stomping
down on the ground. This lowers the Speed stat of
those hit.

name: frost-breath
description:
The user blows its cold breath on the target. This
attack always results in a critical hit.

name: dragon-tail
description:
The target is knocked away, and a different Pokémon
is dragged out. In the wild, this ends a battle against
a single Pokémon.

name: work-up

The user is roused, and its Attack and Sp. Atk
stats increase.

name: electroweb

The user captures and attacks opposing

name: wild-charge

The user shrouds itself in electricity and smashes
into its target. This also damages the user a little.

name: drill-run

The user crashes into its target while rotating its

name: dual-chop

The user attacks its target by hitting it with brutal
strikes. The target is hit twice in a row.

name: heart-stamp

The user unleashes a vicious blow after its cute act

target flinch.

name: horn-leech

The user drains the target’s energy with its horns.
The user’s HP is restored by half the damage taken
by the target.

name: sacred-sword

The user attacks by slicing with its long
horns. The target’s stat changes
don’t affect this attack’s damage.

name: razor-shell

The user cuts its target with sharp
shells. This attack may also lower the
target’s Defense stat.

name: heat-crash

The user slams its target with its flame-
covered body. The more the user outweighs
the target, the greater the move’s power.

name: leaf-tornado

The user attacks its target by encircling it in sharp
leaves. This attack may also lower the
target’s accuracy.

name: steamroller

The user crushes its target by rolling over the target
with its rolled-up body. This may also make the
target flinch.

name: cotton-guard

The user protects itself by wrapping its body in soft
cotton, which drastically raises the user’s
Defense stat.

name: night-daze

The user lets loose a pitch-black shock wave at its
target. This may also lower the target’s accuracy.

name: psystrike

The user materializes an odd psychic wave to attack
the target. This attack does physical damage.

name: tail-slap

The user attacks by striking the target with its hard
tail. It hits the target two to five times in a row.

The user attacks by wrapping its opponent in a
fierce wind that flies up into the sky. This may also
confuse the target.

name: head-charge

The user charges its head into its target, using its
powerful guard hair. This also damages the user
a little.

name: gear-grind

The user attacks by throwing steel gears at its
target twice.

name: searing-shot

The user torches everything around it in an inferno
of scarlet flames. This may also leave those it hits
with a burn.

name: techno-blast

The user fires a beam of light at its target. The
move’s type changes depending on the Drive the
user holds.

name: relic-song

The user sings an ancient song and attacks by
appealing to the hearts of the listening opposing
Pokémon. This may also induce sleep.

name: secret-sword
description:
The user cuts with its long horn. The odd power
contained in the horn does physical damage to
the target.

name: glaciate
description:
The user attacks by blowing freezing cold
air at opposing Pokémon. This attack
reduces the targets’ Speed stat.

name: bolt-strike
description:
The user surrounds itself with a great amount of
electricity and charges its target. This may also
leave the target with paralysis.

name: blue-flare
description:
The user attacks by engulfing the target in an
intense, yet beautiful, blue flame. This may also leave
the target with a burn.

name: fiery-dance
description:
Cloaked in flames, the user dances and flaps its
wings. This may also raise the user’s Sp. Atk stat.

name: freeze-shock
description:
On the second turn, the user hits the target with
electrically charged ice. This may also leave the
target with paralysis.

name: ice-burn
description:
On the second turn, an ultracold, freezing wind
surrounds the target. This may leave the target with
a burn.

name: snarl
description:
The user yells as if it’s ranting about something,

name: icicle-crash

The user attacks by harshly dropping large icicles

name: v-create
description:
With a hot flame on its forehead, the user hurls itself
at its target. This lowers the user’s Defense, Sp. Def,
and Speed stats.

name: fusion-flare
description:
The user brings down a giant flame. This move’s
power is increased when influenced by an enormous
lightning bolt.

name: fusion-bolt
description:
The user throws down a giant lightning bolt. This
move’s power is increased when influenced by an
enormous flame.

name: flying-press
description:
The user dives down onto the target from the sky.
This move is Fighting and Flying type simultaneously.

name: mat-block

Using a pulled-up mat as a shield, the user protects
itself and its allies from damaging moves. This does
not stop status moves.

name: belch
description:
The user lets out a damaging belch at the target.
The user must eat a held Berry to use this move.

name: rototiller
description:
Tilling the soil, the user makes it easier for plants to
grow. This raises the Attack and Sp. Atk stats of
Grass-type Pokémon.

name: sticky-web
description:
The user weaves a sticky net around the opposing
team, which lowers their Speed stat upon switching
into battle.

name: fell-stinger
description:
When the user knocks out a target with this move,
the user’s Attack stat rises drastically.

name: phantom-force

The user vanishes somewhere, then strikes the
target on the next turn. This move hits even if the
target protects itself.

name: trick-or-treat
description:
The user takes the target trick-or-treating.
This adds Ghost type to the target’s type.

name: noble-roar
description:
Letting out a noble roar, the user intimidates the
target and lowers its Attack and Sp. Atk stats.

name: ion-deluge
description:
The user disperses electrically charged particles,
which changes Normal-type moves to
Electric-type moves.

name: parabolic-charge
description:
The user attacks everything around it. The user’s HP
is restored by half the damage taken by those hit.

name: forests-curse
description:
The user puts a forest curse on the target.
Afflicted targets are now Grass type as well.

name: petal-blizzard
description:
The user stirs up a violent petal blizzard and attacks
everything around it.

name: freeze-dry
description:
The user rapidly cools the target. This may also
leave the target frozen. This move is super effective
on Water types.

name: disarming-voice
description:
Letting out a charming cry, the user does emotional
damage to opposing Pokémon. This attack
never misses.

name: parting-shot

With a parting threat, the user lowers the target’s
Attack and Sp. Atk stats. Then it switches with a
party Pokémon.

name: topsy-turvy

All stat changes affecting the target turn
topsy-turvy and become the opposite of what
they were.

name: draining-kiss

The user steals the target’s energy with a kiss.
The user’s HP is restored by over half
of the damage taken by the target.

name: crafty-shield

The user protects itself and its allies from status
moves with a mysterious power. This does not stop
moves that do damage.

name: flower-shield
description:
The user raises the Defense stat of all Grass-type
Pokémon in battle with a mysterious power.

The user turns the ground to grass for five turns.
This restores the HP of Pokémon on the ground a
little every turn and powers up Grass type-moves.

name: misty-terrain
